description:
In the Kingdom of Fiore lies a terrible weapon: the Dragon Cry, a magical staff rumored to possess power capable of destroying the world. For years, it's been safely guarded and kept away from those tempted by its power. But everything changes when a traitor named Zash manages to steal it away. Now, in the hands of Animus— the cruel ruler of the Kingdom of Stella— a plot begins to form with the fate of the world at their mercy.

Luckily, a simple recovery task is nothing for the wizards of Fairy Tail! Together, Natsu and his friends go undercover to infiltrate Stella Kingdom in hopes of getting answers and restoring safety to the realm. But they quickly find there's more to this staff than the stories claim. What power really dwells within the Dragon Cry, and is the gang strong enough to fight ultimate destruction?

(Source: Crunchyroll, edited)
synonyms: Fairy Tail the Movie: Dragon Cry

node.description:
__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hiro_mashima)__ | __[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQLYbIvGWtClestisnB1_6A)__

Japanese manga artist most known for his manga Groove Adventure Rave, published by Kodansha's Weekly Shonen Magazine, from 1999 to 2005. The series was later adapted into an anime. However, the anime adaption was cancelled before it could complete the series.

In 2003, he collected some of his one-shot titles in two volumes: Mashima-en- Vol.1 & 2. Those stories include, among others, Cocona, "Xmas Hearts" and "Fairy Tail", a sort of prototype for his last work.

In 2006, he began his now finished series, Fairy Tail, serialized in Kodansha's Weekly Shonen Magazine. He also published the manga Monster Hunter Orage.

Hiro Mashima was a notable guest at the 2008 San Diego Comic-Con. He has one daughter.

His artwork and [Oda Eiichiro](https://anilist.co/staff/96881/EiichiroOda)'s are greatly similar, but that is due to both of them being influenced largely by [Toriyama Akira](https://anilist.co/staff/96901/AkiraToriyama)'s work growing up.

His former assistant was [Yoshikawa Miki](https://anilist.co/staff/98703/MikiYoshikawa) author of Yankee-kun to Megane-chan.
Shouji Hata is an Audio Engineer.
He did photography work initally. Also adept in animating.
He did photography work initally. Also adept in animating.

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/williamvianadub/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/WilliamVianaDub) | [Facebook](https://facebook.com/william.beoulve)

William Viana Schuler, better known simply as William Viana, is a Brazilian actor, voice actor, voiceover and dubbing director. He has been working in the area since 2012. He owns the studio Imagine Sound Thinking, in addition to currently directing at Som de Vera Cruz and at Alcatéia Audiovisual.

__Non-Anime Roles:__
~!- Ichigo Kurosaki (Bleach Live Action)
- Karabo "KB" Molapo (Blood & Water)
- Harpe Noir (Grand Chase: Dimensional Chaser)
- Zhou Yu (Honor of Kings)
- N (Murder Drones)
- Rezaren Ammosine (Dragon Age: Absolution)
- Post Malone (Ghost Adventures)
- Gio Fortunato (Cruise)
!~
Tyler Walker is an ADR Director, Script writer and voice actor for FUNimation.
